author: Colin Fry
prompt:
Certainly, here's the list of "Never have I ever" questions, numbered:

1. Never have I ever sent someone a naughty pic.
2. Never have I ever slept in the nude.
3. Never have I ever received a lap dance.
4. Never have I ever given a lap dance.
5. Never have I ever taken a sexy selfie.
6. Never have I ever had a friend with benefits.
7. Never have I ever kissed a stranger.
8. Never have I ever flashed someone.
9. Never have I ever had a threesome.
10. Never have I ever role-played.
11. Never have I ever been skinny dipping.
12. Never have I ever been caught looking at something naughty.
13. Never have I ever made out with someone of the same sex.
14. Never have I ever sexted.
15. Never have I ever flirted with a teacher.
16. Never have I ever been to a nude beach.
17. Never have I ever watched porn.
18. Never have I ever had a crush on a coworker.
19. Never have I ever been to an adult store.
20. Never have I ever played Dirty Truth or Dare.
21. Never have I ever taken a shower selfie.
22. Never have I ever been shy in the bedroom.

Would you like to play a game with one of these questions, or should I create a new one? Please respond with 'Yes' or 'No'.

description.zh_Hans: 大胆向心仪对象提问，毫不退缩。
description.zh_Hant: 大膽向心儀對象提問，毫不退縮。
description.en: Ask bold questions to the person you like, without hesitation.
